name: Easy Vanilla Vegan Gluten Free Cake
description: My Easy Vanilla Vegan Gluten Free Cake is made in 1 bowl and requires only 8 ingredients. It’s fluffy, moist, tender and bursting with vanilla flavor. Plus there is no added oil to the cake itself!
recipeIngredient: 2 cups all purpose gluten free flour mix  ((I used King Arthur brand))
2 tablespoons softened vegan butter (OR omit and use more almond milk for oil free)

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat to 350 degrees F and lightly grease 2 8-inch round pans. I also put a round parchment paper piece in the bottom for easy removal.
recipeInstructions.name: Preheat to 350 degrees F and lightly grease 2 8-inch round pans. I also put a round parchment paper piece in the bottom for easy removal.

recipeInstructions.text: In a large bowl, whisk the almond flour, gluten free flour, sugar, baking powder and salt.  Then add the almond milk, vinegar and vanilla. Stir well but do not over mix. Pour evenly into the prepared pans.
recipeInstructions.name: In a large bowl, whisk the almond flour, gluten free flour, sugar, baking powder and salt.  Then add the almond milk, vinegar and vanilla. Stir well but do not over mix. Pour evenly into the prepared pans.

recipeInstructions.text: Bake for 30-35 minutes. Remove from the oven and let cool completely before frosting.
recipeInstructions.name: Bake for 30-35 minutes. Remove from the oven and let cool completely before frosting.

recipeInstructions.text: Make the icing: Place the softened vegan butter, powdered sugar, almond milk and vanilla in a bowl and mix on low, then high until creamy and smooth. Add more milk or powdered sugar as needed to make a spreadable frosting.
recipeInstructions.name: Make the icing: Place the softened vegan butter, powdered sugar, almond milk and vanilla in a bowl and mix on low, then high until creamy and smooth. Add more milk or powdered sugar as needed to make a spreadable frosting.

recipeInstructions.text: Frost the cake as desired and top with optional sprinkles. Enjoy!
recipeInstructions.name: Frost the cake as desired and top with optional sprinkles. Enjoy!

keywords: gluten free vanilla cake, vegan gluten free cake
